name: Home Energy Copilot
author: Your Name
description: An AI-powered G-Assist plug-in that optimizes home energy usage and EV charging based on time-of-use tariffs.

commands.name: optimize_energy
commands.description: Run home energy optimization (eco/comfort modes) and control non-critical devices during peak hours.

commands.name: charge_ev
commands.description: Intelligently schedule EV charging using low-tariff hours or manual override (auto/force_on/force_off).

commands.name: turn_on_device
commands.description: Turn on a specific home device (e.g., lamp, ac, charger).

commands.name: turn_off_device
commands.description: Turn off a specific home device (e.g., lamp, ac, charger).
